name: Subscribe new Thinkific community members to KlickTipp
description:
This scenario connects Thinkific with KlickTipp to automatically subscribe new community members when they join your Thinkific site.

When a new user registers in Thinkific, the scenario instantly adds or updates the contact in KlickTipp, assigning them to a predefined list and tag. Basic user information such as first name, last name, company, and signup data is transferred automatically.

This integration ensures that your KlickTipp account stays synchronized with your Thinkific community â€” helping you maintain clean contact records and trigger relevant email sequences right away.

You can easily customize this workflow to include additional data fields or connect it to further automations, such as onboarding campaigns or lead nurturing flows.
